title: M.S Cuplock Vertical – 3M
description: Durable 3-meter MS Cuplock Standard designed for maximum load-bearing strength. Ideal for tall scaffolding structures, ensuring safety and stability on construction sites. Hot-dip galvanized or painted finish for long life and corrosion resistance.
features: Perfect for tall and heavy-duty scaffolding

title: M.S Cuplock Ledger – 2M
description: High-strength 2-meter MS Cuplock Ledger designed to provide horizontal support and stability in scaffolding systems.

title: U Jack – 600mm
description: Strong and reliable 600mm adjustable U Jack ideal for leveling and height correction in scaffolding systems.

title: Aluminium Formwork – Slab
description: Durable aluminum and steel Mivan panels for formwork systems. Known for speed, precision, and smooth concrete finish. Ideal for modern construction projects and repetitive casting.

title: H Frame
description: Rigid MS H Frame designed for easy assembly and vertical alignment. Commonly used for plastering, painting, and façade work.
